sentences.en: Claire looked longingly at the sunlit gardens outside the window.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔望着窗外洒满阳光的花园，内心充满渴望。

sentences.en: Her house has two big sunlit rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows.
sentences.cn: 她的房子有两间向阳的带落地窗的大屋子。

sentences.en: In the approach movie, Mercury appears as a sunlit crescent.
sentences.cn: 水星在影片中看起来就像是一弯新月.

sentences.en: Sweet the rains'new fall sunlit from heaven.
sentences.cn: 初下的雨水和来自天庭的阳光何等甜美.

sentences.en: The fresh sunlit January morning filled the young teacher with happy thought.
sentences.cn: 一月的早晨清新晴朗,令年轻教师心中充满了愉快的感想.

sentences.en: The image shows the sunlIt'side of Saturn's rings.
sentences.cn: 在这张照片中,土星的光环清晰可见.

sentences.en: The little boat was skimming across the sunlit surface of the bay.
sentences.cn: 一叶小舟正轻轻掠过阳光下的海湾。

sentences.en: The sunlit grove was like something out of Grimm.
sentences.cn: 这个洒满阳光的小树林,简直和《格林童话》里的仙境一般.

sentences.en: The sunlit pedestal drops three more stories to the cave floor.
sentences.cn: 这一块阳光照射的基石离洞底足足三层楼高.

words.tran_cn: 阳光照射不到的，阴暗的
阳光充足的，和煦的；快活的；性情开朗的
阳光照射，阳光充足；活泼

trans.tran_en: made brighter by light from the sun
